content.detailedDescription: Observing stars in backyard at 6:58 pm, was looking at stars/planets on western horizon when this shockingly bright white(slight bluish tinge) star-like, planetary object sized ufo catches my eye. traveling at a high rate of speed from nw to se in straight line, appx 30,000-50,000 altitude. i have seen many fast moving space objects(satellites, fireballs, etc) and this was very different. the star-like glow did not waver or blink in pattern like an aircraft, and no visible jet burn nor fire trail. there was also no sound of any kind. i was able to yell loudly to my hubby got him to run outside to witness it too. by then the star-like object was almost out of range. the whole event took only a minute. hope someone else saw it because it was amazing. if it is an aircraft sign me up for training please. :-)
content.summary: Incredibly bright planetary object sized white bluish sphere moving high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
In 1953( give or take a year) i came home on a late sept. day. it was about 55 degrees.  i look up from my side walk =, ready to enter my parents house.  and there where 2 silver saucers about 800 feet above our house, in a break of clouds.  i look up what seem only 15 to 20 seconds, yet my mother looking out the windows says it was a long time.  i told my mother it was only so many seconds, buy she said it was a long time.  my neck was stiff looking up, so maybe it was a long time, i do not know.  that was my one  sighing... until 1973.  i was a science and math teacher in honedale catholic in late oct. 1973.  i was going home when on route 196 between honesdale and lake ariel when 20 some minutes before dark after a science fair, a saucer about 500 to 1000 feet, the car 200yards in front... lights when out and enginewhen over the by pass bridge in /\cherry hill (about 3 miles from honesdale}.  i saw an object appearing out of no where. acar 200 yards in front of lights when out and stop dead as the saucer past on top of it.I turn off my engine, rolled the window down, and hear wind noise pass by.  
the ojbect about 200 yrds to my left,about 500 feet in the air , keep flying toward honesdale.  later that oct. 30 people saw flying objects recorded in the scranton /////times newspaper.  what's going on?
content.summary: Two silver objects blue patch on a cloudy day

content.detailedDescription: I am still witnessing this light hovering west of me in elko, nv. it emitted a red pulsating light the is still hovering around near the object. i am unsure of what to make of this. it does have a light that is hovering just below it as well. i have video and i am still watching this. it really has not moved since i seen it. the pictures i have so far are kind of blurry, but the video is good.
content.summary: Bright light over elko, nv.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were driving down highway 2 towards the west, and i looked up to see if there were any planes in the sky, a habit of my since i work at boeing and i always check the sky for airplanes.  i noticed that the was a silver metallic object high up in the sky and quickly told my girlfriend,' that's not a plane, no chem trails, it's not moving, and it's way too high." she quickly looked and concurred,"oh yeah, wow". the object was there hovering for 7-10 seconds, then vanished out of the sky.
content.summary: We were driving down highway 2 and looked up in the sky and there it was

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving and noticed a big bright white light in front of me over the road. i am very aware of stars, planes and helicopters as we have many in our area and i know what i saw was not any of those. also, i travel this road a lot - at least 2 times a day and about 4 times on weekends- this same path- and have never seen a plane or anything over the road in this area. this is what first made me really wonder what this thing was. also, it was much larger than a star or plane and the light was very white.

i noticed it was 3 lights in a angled row so i got my cell phone out to start filming.  it seemed to just hover over the road. i was still heading straight for it.   the video is pretty crazy because i was still driving and trying to record at the same time.  

as i got closer to it i really could see that is was big and the 3 lights were more clear. i pulled over to film and that is the last frame where you can really see the three lights.  i also heard a motor sound so at first i thought it had to be something man made...And this is going to seem stupid, but there was also a weird guy starring at me (this was at night in an empty parking lot) so i got kind of scared and got back in my car.  i went home and showed it to my mom and my son and we went back out to look for it but could not find it.

i have it on my iphone and it is too big to email so i cannot send to attach to the file below but i was able to upload to youtube so here is the link

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

i would really just like to know what this thing is.
content.summary: Three very bright white lights but all together- not 3 separate crafts - looked like they were in the

content.detailedDescription:
I was 9 or 10 years old and woke up sitting up and looking out bedroom window. a large star was coming towards me in sky - parallel to my eye site (2 story house). it was getting larger and larger...I thought it was a plane. then it shot off in different straight-line directions and then would return to the point where it initially started. after a few minutes of that it shot off at a straight upward angle and disappeared. these movements were fast. 

it felt like i was being communicated with and that they were my friends. 

now (which is 45 yrs later) - i have a sense that i was taken aboard and they were saying good bye. and since that time i'm visited often in my dreams by alien ships.
content.summary: Woke up sitting up in bed staring at star coming towards me getting larger.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving north on interstate 35 between austin and dallas this morning. the weather this morning was beautiful. light wispy clouds. blue skies. 54 degrees. no rain. just perfect weather. the highway was dry—i was driving 75/80 mph. i estimate there were between 30-40 vehicles on the road immediately in front of us. i first noticed these two objects at approximately 9:45 a.M. we were north of georgetown, texas and had just passed exit 268. we exited the highway a few minutes later at exit 275—stopping at the flying j travel plaza to get gas. the time stamp on the gas receipt is 9:55 a.M. the two objects crossed the highway in front of us at an elevation of approximately 1000 feet. they were perfectly in-line with one another—approximately 3000 feet apart. it’s like they were flying on a stretched out wire—perfectly in-line with one another. they were identical in size, shape, and color. the shape and color of these two objects was contrasted against the blue sky. they were shiny—a bright white. there were no discernable wings, tails, landing gear, propellers, jet engines, windows, or lights. they were two cylindrical cigar-shaped objects with rounded nose and tails. i believe the objects were two-to-three miles ahead of us when i first saw them. they crossed just above the tree line traveling from west to east. they were in my field of view for 5-seconds and traveling at a high rate of speed. i pointed and asked my wife to look out her passenger window to see if she could see what i was watching. she watched the two objects for another 20-seconds until the topography to the east blocked her view. she said the objects did not alter their course, configuration, elevation, or speed—remaining quickly traveling to the east at a high rate of speed until they were no longer visible from her vantage point.
content.summary: Two bright shiny white cylindrical cigar-shaped objects rounded nose and tails

content.detailedDescription: Took a photo at a triathlon
content.summary: Observed it on my photo during post production

content.detailedDescription: I was in niagara falls new york looking at the falls and the lighted buildings on canada side. i first noticed it as a dull light in the sky, i assumed it was a building reflecting light. it was a purple light with a purple haze around it and a light being projected from the top. my reaction was confusion because it was no longer there. i lost sight when i looked at my friends to point it out to them and when i looked back it was gone
content.summary: Hovered then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was going to my college,then in the way i saw 4 trails but i didn't gave much attention to it but then near police bhavan,approximate coordinates 15.871362,74.516592 i saw 4 flying objects one was big others weer small . the big was boomerang shaped the others were to small to get their shape but they were surrounding it.The small looked like they were protecting the big ship.They all were white colored,they were moving too fast  and they were gone heading their destination just like a normal plane does.
content.summary: They where 4 ufo's , one was big and others were small surrounding it as if they were trying to protect the big one.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were sitting outside on this night talking. a light was projected around me as a perfect circle and did not move for a minute or so. this light had edges that were perfectly sharp and unmoveing. the light then wobbled a little and started to travel away from my friend and i. we watched it travel across the grass and across some trees. this beam was not wobbly and moved very slowly. it then slowly receded into sky were we seen a craft projecting the light, it did no move at all. it was like a long florescent light bulb in the sky. we observed this lighted craft for a couple of minutes, then it suddenly and very very quickly either flew away from us or turned off light. it was an amazing sight. my friend who i'm still in contact with still to this day can not explain what he witnessed with me. we are both still trying to come to terms with what was in the sky that night.Also street lights after the craft disappeared started to flicker and some shut off completely very strangely.
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed a craft stationary, project a beam of light around my sitting body.

content.detailedDescription: I was waslking along with my dog on the manchester ship canal near my home address when on looking up into the night sky i saw a ball of bright light moving at high speed from one cloud cluster to another, i watched the cloud where it moved to for several minutes but it didnt exit the cloud nor did it reappear. on returning to my home a friend had said that his son had also witnessed a similar series of events at a similar time and location. straight away i thought i must of seen a ufo and when my friend had said his son had a smiliar experience i felt i must of been correct in what i had just witnessed. i lost sight of the object when it disappeared behind cloud cover. i was gutted that it did not reappear.
content.summary: A ball of brightwhite light moving at high speed from cloud cover at approx north to cloud cover north east and didnt exit cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Saw ufo hovering over furys ferry road. wife thought it was new cell tower or something but lights were white and very bright. drove underneath and to one side and saw it was a triangle with bright lights at each corner and small red light in center. as we drove past it tilted slightly and began moving. i drove down 1/4 mile and spun around. by the time we got back it had moved off very rapidly and it is appeared into the distance. thought i saw a blinking/pulsing blue light on the side facing us as it flew off. no sound.
content.summary: Wife, son, and i saw ufo while we were driving home.

content.detailedDescription:
At the supper table of our daughter, our 4-year-old grand daughter pointed out the window and yelled "look, look! purple lines in the sky!"  the fact that she noticed something like that surprised me as much as anything.  i got up to look and there were several dark purple, elongated clouds(?) 15-20° above the horizon which were unusual and extraordinarily spectacular, but i thought were just very, long stringy clouds in the distance.  the rest of the sky was totally cloudless; but as i was looking away, something caught my eye at 30° above the horizon to the sw, a white cloud; perfectly formed like a disc; angled at 45°. 
i pointed it out to my wife who thought it impressively unusual, as well.  we got the kids settled and i decided to go out to the backyard for a better look with the sun setting.  the disc-shaped cloud had not moved at all; not in position, size or shape; and, this was over the period of an 45 minutes to an hour.  
i decided to take some pictures with my old 4s iphone (attached).  for this area, a motionless cloud at that angle for that length of time was, as least in my experience, most unusual.  as i was thinking this, a low-flying jet (under 500') flew right overhead; except it did not go towards the disc-shaped cloud, it headed straight for the horizon - then, it suddenly put its afterburners on - the first time i had seen  that happen in person (it looked like two, close-set fire red eyes heading away from me.)  i did not get a picture of that, unfortunately; but i started taking them soon after.
i decided to move out away from the trees and into the pasture when i heard a helicopter heading for the horizon from the south.  i started taking pictures of the helicopter heading towards the horizon and noticed the flash was on - though i doubt it would light up anything. .  after taking several flash pictures of the helicopter, it suddenly turned and headed straight for me and was getting there fast.
normally, i would stand out in the open and just watch it fly over - but something told me i should retreat to the cover of the trees; i continued to take pictures of the helicopter, but no longer saw its lights.  the helicopter flew directly over the house, not more than 100' high and it was not a small craft - it was a double-blade sikorsky-type helicopter and it was jet-black and unmarked with numbers or insignias. it was now dark and the helicopter was almost indistinguishable through the barren trees against the sky.  i was really surprised as i was expecting to see an army-green helicopter, not a jet-black one (i thought to myself “no way...”).  i tried to take its picture as it flew over but it didn't take or i missed the button, probably the latter.
i went back in the house and told my wife about it and decided to go to an upstairs porch and look through a spotting scope and binoculars to see if i could see anything; but before i could get focused on anything,  two low flying jets, one a couple of seconds ahead of the other passed by. i decided to go back indoors for the night after that. however, none of the aircraft flew towards the disc-shaped cloud, which remained unchanged in size, shape or position until it was too dark to see. 
i cannot say what, if anything, was going on that was ufo related; but it was an anomalous night for several first-time experiences and sights for me.
content.summary: Stationary cloud-like disc angled 45°; black helicopter; low jets with afterburners

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out for a walk and we both witnessed 6-7 lights moving very quickly from east to west. it looked like a half a flock of geese , that were glowing brightly. the lights looked like the outline of a bird, but were glowing orange. we watched them move from the western horizon to the eastern horizon in a period of about 5 seconds. they were moving very quickly. we were both amazed and startled. i said "do you see what i am seeing?" and my wife said "yes". 


i did not have time to pull out my phone to video the event. i was so startled that it didn't cross my mind till the lights were gone. 

i should mention that is was a partly cloudy evening, but the lights were just as bright where there were no clouds. this could not have been a spotlight.
content.summary: 6-7 glowing lights, moving quickly from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen feeding my cat.  i looked out of the window (8th floor) and noticed a strange formation of orange orbs flying slowly from the north of eugene to the west of eugene.  in total there were about 30 of these.  as i started counting them they turned and disappeared.  my first impression was that they were some planes leaving eugene airport.  but it didnt seem right so i called the police dept to see if anyone else or the police helicopter saw them.  the answer was no.  i continued to watch with cheap binoculars and saw that some of these orbs flashed red but mostly stayed orange.  they appeared roundish.  there are very few planes that fly over this city so it was quite a sight.  it is possible that they are some kind of military flight.  30 very similar flying craft at night are still pretty weird.  because of the the unusual nature, i felt like pearl harbor moment and thats why i called the police.
content.summary: At approximately 9:45 pm i witnessed orange roundish lights flying slowly from the north of eugene to the west of eugene.  they were flying in an unusual  formation.  some of them also flashed red.  i called the police dept to report them

content.detailedDescription:
Had just text info about mars/venus conjunction to a friend. so i was noticing sky- how clear it was but with small amount of haze on horizon (20degrees to horizon) otherwise very clear. object seemed to be at perimeter, and just behind this slight haze. it seemed to move within the haze a few times. it had no lights but a very dull light gray, metallic appearance. i assume that this was slightly reflecting city lights. it did not emanate any light. you would have to be looking at that particular line of sight to even notice it. it was very light and somewhat masked behind the very slight haze/fog. but absolutely, clearly an object moving along an eastward path in the sky about five hundred feet above the land. it changed direction very smoothly and quickly (unlike a plane) and continued in a straight easterly direction. 
speed was a bit faster than a plane at that same distance but slowed down after direction change then regained original speed. the change in direction was about 3 or 4 lengths of its size- (sfo is about 15 miles away from my location at the time and there was actually a plane at the same distance as the object to the west at 35 degrees to horizon- but not at all close to object.)

thought that it could have been a (huge!) drone but it had no lights. i imagined something that large would be legally required to have lights. object moved out of view, never changed in size, shape or detail of outline.
it seemed very drone-like. seemed to be surveying(?). i was shocked at what i was seeing. i tried to take a picture with my iphone5 but screen would not accept my touch.(%$&*ing i-phone screens) object was the size of three large airplanes put together if each airplane filled out their respective full diameters.
it felt "unmanned" until it changed direction which of course seemed to indicate that a decision was being made by something to change direction.
content.summary: No lights- dull gray 3 perfect circles in a triangular shape moving as one- could see clear outline of circles but no outline of their connection - object very abruptly but quite smoothly  jogged left then returned to a straight, easterly direction

content.detailedDescription: I was in driveway barbecuing looked up at sky was shocked to see 3 bright orange pulsating oval shapes in triangle formation 2 at top 1 bottom knew immediately wasn't normal aircraft due to lack off red or green marker lights and private aircraft was cross get sky at lower elevation. formation continued getting closer with no noise. top right one took off to out of sight going to the right. didn't turn like aircraft just went straight right fast.Half min later top left object did same in left direction i counted 3 sec from breaking formation to out of sight. bottom one continued closer getting lower almost then appeared as a 50's sci-fi movie shape. white and black lights pulsing became apparent at bottom sides pulsed orange top solid orange then at 20 to 30 degree climb angle flying to r i ght. incredibly fast out of sight less than 3 seconds. i know it wasn't sur variance drones or the small toy drones due to flight characteristics and comparing to pictures of drones
content.summary: 3 orange pulsating lights oval shaped in upside down triangle formation flying from n.E. tip right object flew right fast gone in 5-6 secs top left did same in left direction 30 sec later bottom one cont. toward me then in less than 2 sec. disappe

content.detailedDescription: I was in driveway barbecuing looked up at sky was shocked to see 3 bright orange pulsating oval shapes in triangle formation 2 at top 1 bottom knew immediately wasn't normal aircraft due to lack off red or green marker lights and private aircraft was cross get sky at lower elevation. formation continued getting closer with no noise. top right one took off to out of sight going to the right. didn't turn like aircraft just went straight right fast.Half min later top left object did same in left direction i counted 3 sec from breaking formation to out of sight. bottom one continued closer getting lower almost then appeared as a 50's sci-fi movie shape. white and black lights pulsing became apparent at bottom sides pulsed orange top solid orange then at 20 to 30 degree climb angle flying to r i ght. incredibly fast out of sight less than 3 seconds. i know it wasn't sur variance drones or the small toy drones due to flight characteristics and comparing to pictures of drones
content.summary: 3 orange pulsating lights oval shaped in upside down triangle formation flying from n.E. then tip right object flew right fast gone in 5-6 seconds top left did same in left direction 30 sec later bottom one cont. toward me then in less than 2 sec.

content.detailedDescription: I went to let my cat out on the back porch of my house and in doing so i saw the moon in the west. it was a beautiful clear evening when i went out to observe the moon and i believe venus below it. i was using some field glasses at the time at around 7 pm. i live approx. 10 miles from the bellingham int'l airport and watch flight traffic daily and at night so i have a great sense for anything out of the ordinary. at 7:02 a object of a different color without the strobes the jetliners and other air traffic displays approached from the nw, it was a bright gold/copper. at this point my interest was on that object because i knew it was no jet, airplane or helicopter, it was a ufo i was confident of that. i was unable to see any difference in it's appearance like a dome or wings it was a moving dot and it moved what seemed a straight line, as if it knew where it was headed. with my field glasses i tracked it for 7 minutes until it disappeared into a low cloud in the se sky. the bp refinery is near by and in it's processing of fuels it makes a white cloud of emissions and that is the cloud it went into, the very small tip of the cloud which i thought it would come through and appear again. i scanned the area that i would have thought it would reappear around for 2 or 3 minutes which was widened as i tried to find it again. i didn't see it again after that. i've seen satellites on several occasions and this object was lower than those and it wasn't the bright silver or chrome of appearance of those objects. this is the third time i have reported seeing these objects but they have come this direction twice and from due west once.
content.summary: {rjl} int'l airport and there is constant air traffic in the area.

content.detailedDescription:
The summer of'76 late night or early morning.I got out of bed and went to the window. over the trees at the far side of the house was a bright white perfect pyramid craft. my first thought was it was a two man ship.The mainbody of it was bright white and spun rapidly but it flew straight. on one point was a blue light on one tip a green light and on the other tip was    white light. part of me remembers a red light somewhere anyway,my room was at one end of the house and when i first saw it, it it was at the far side of the house,i remember touching my eyes to make sure i was awake it was maybe20,25feet off the ground maybe10 feet away from the side of the house slowly flying parallel to the second floor of the house. there was no sound, at first i was amazed then i thought if i can see it they can see me then i had an overwhelming feeling of dread and fear.I ran to the closet
and hid. i remember seeing the bright light under the door and then i'm in my mom's room crying and she's telling me to go back to sleep my dad walked me back to my room and my friend who was sleeping over said she saw something in the neighbors drive way.Next thing i know i'm coming home from school the next day then when my dad got home he tol qd my mom that she should have believed me cause in the paper was an article that said the town about30minutes away saw the same thing i saw. after that she always looked at the sky she wanted to see them too. iwas13when that happened i'm 51now i can't talk about it without crying even after all these years i don't know what happened to make me cry when i think about it still . i do have a lot of dreams about ships in the sky and i see the the tall shining blonde beautiful people. but i had to tell someone about my sighting even though it was a long time ago.I'm still a little scared that the "men in black"will come to the door.  if you think i could help i'd talk to you i've seen triangle ufo's on your show some are similar but not quite.I'm willing to do hypnosis just to put my
mind to rest. thank you for listening.
deirdre osborne
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What appeared to be a 2man perfect pyrimid craft  outside my house

content.detailedDescription: I have a history of face to face alien contact, in person, total so far of 33.  i meet with four specific beings every several months.  this is the first time something of this nature has happened.  i went to get up in the morning and as i took the comforter away from me i noticed tears/rips in the bedspread.  this is a brand new, only about a month old tops.  tonight, 02/21/15, while visiting with my close friend, joe palermo, who happens to be your chief ufo investigator for missouri mufon, i told him about this and the fact that i found my locked front door unlocked and slightly ajar the same morning.  joe retrieved his fi bag from his car and examined the sheet with his uv light.  we found several stains of some kind about midway where i sleep.  it was not me (i have a condition where that would be impossible).  joe then called missouri mufon state director debbie ziegelemeyer, who is also a friend of mine.  she recommended making a report here, and securing the bedspread in a paper bag for preservation and hand off to joe who will get it to debbie who will send it in for analysis.  joe also took pictures of the ripped sheets with his cell phone (will attach as soon as possible).  ***note:  this form would not let me submit without declaring something observed.  i marked abduction, but, to my knowledge, this did not occur.
content.summary: Ripped bedspread

content.detailedDescription:
Roommate and i were standing on front porch. roommate saw bright glowing shape moving south to north, basically over french quarter to central business district. he pointed it out and asked me what color i thought that was. when i stood up to look at it i said orange, then yellow-orange. he asked me what aircraft had yellow or orange lights. we then listened for sound of the aircraft to determine what type of craft it might be. roommate couldn't hear anything, i thought i heard a faint droning sound. due to the brightness of the light, we could not determine the size or shape of the craft. 
a minute or so later we saw a second object of the same relative size, color of light and following the exact same path. this one had a paired object a set distance behind it. then followed the second pair, objects 4 and 5, then the third and last pair, objects 6 and 7. the three pair maintained the exact same speed and distance between each other and all 7 travelled along the exact (to my eyes) same path and elevation in the sky. 
we could hear no discernible sound specifically from the 7 objects nor ever determine the size or shape of the craft the lights were attached to. 
while discussing this, we could hear a helicopter several miles off to our west, which made the lack of sound from the visible aircraft all the more interesting.
content.summary: Saw bright orb shape fly along path s to n. min or so later saw 3 pair follow same path, equidistant to each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out to the east from our back porch at a clear dusk sky, still light out, when i observed a white orb / ufo object moving overhead from the west to the east.  the house roof line runs north/south, and the object was visible once it had crossed over the roof at 90 degrees straight up.  i followed the movement for a few moments then went for a camera (dslr) and returned when the object had gotten to about (estimation) 60 to 45 degrees from the horizon and started photographing the object with the dslr camera.  the object remained bright for at least a minute moving quickly over the city of eugene, oregon.  this is not the first time this or these kinds of objects have crossed over the city of eugene, oregon.
content.summary: Clear sky, dusk, still light out, wind gusts.  bright white orb ufo object moving silent overhead from the west to the east then fading out quickly.  no sound was heard

content.detailedDescription: I walked out onto my deck to smoke at about 7:10pm. after lighting up i inhaled and looked up to the night sky to observe the stars like i always do. that's when my peripheral vision picked up something out of the ordinary. i turned my head to the south and saw a triangle of pulsating green lights hovering above the ridgeline. i remember thinking "that's not normal" so i just sat there watching them for a minute. that's when they moved. the three lights jumped faster than i've ever seen a plane move, about a 1/4 of the way across the sky, and then just as quickly stopped. before i could think, they jumped back to the general area of the sky where they were when i first noticed them. they hovered there at at a lower altitude and a bright white light (kind of like a spotlight) turned on in the middle of the three lights. once this happened i could make out the shape of a greyish/black triangle in which all of the lights were situated. at this point i decided i better go grab my phone to get a video but as i flicked my cigarette the craft streaked away at max speed to the south east, disappearing up into the stars. the whole incident couldn't have lasted more than three minutes. it kind of freaked me out but was tremendously exciting at the same time. i saw a ufo when i was a kid once but nobody believed me. up until recently i'd begun to think i'd just imagined it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle of green lights: hovered, then moved faster than any craft i know of and made impossible directional changes.

content.detailedDescription: On approximately feb. 7th 2015, around midnight, my wife stepped outside of her mother's house to photograph the moon, which was full and exceptionally bright. i wasn't present. there was a apparently a bright star close to the moon, in a stationary position, and she didn't pay much attention to it at first. after taking a pic of the moon, she zoomed in and took another. she then lowered the camera to adjust the zoom, and noticed movement out of the corner of her eye. when she looked up, the star-like object was moving straight down. she raised the camera and took another picture, the last pic shows the path of the object, although there was some camera shake too. then the object disappeared. if you zoom in on the stationary object, it appears to have four separate sections, in a diamond shape.
content.summary: Wife photographed star like object at first stationary then falling from view and disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving to san francisco;  i was reclining in my seat looking out of the sunroof when i saw a shiny silver disc with a dome on top and bottom of it. i immediately sat up and stuck my head out of the window and watched it for about two minutes.  it seemed to hover over coddingtown shopping center in santa rosa, ca then took off headed east. it went behind a cloud and that was all i saw.  we were headed south on hwy. 101 at the time. i just wondered if anyone else in the area saw it?
content.summary: Driving to san francisco i looked out of the sun roof of our car; i was reclining and i saw a silver disc shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Hi i would like to be contacted so i can send a photo for you to investigate. its a very clear photo of something i believe to be extra terrestrial. as i was driveing home i saw a hovering craft right above us.
content.summary: White vessel hovering

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i wrote to yous last night, but, i left some little things out,, kinda, hoping to get a interview..I wrote to somebody that was in charge of some ufo report[ not sure which-one it was]the very next day or so while this area is still "fresh" the memory of me and neighbors and the surrounding area,, this thing was very low and going very slow when it started moving due north, there has to be many others that seen this thing, i watched it until it went out of sight...When this orange ball was descending from the night sky right in front of me,, you can see everything about this object, it was descending for about 4-6 seconds before these 7 flat bright white lights came on blinking very fast at first and slowed the blinking, but, the light stayed on longer and longer as it slowed down blinking, which caused the craft to slow down until complete stop just above a neighbors house......Ok..Now with these 7 blinking lights that were obviously its brakes for descending or it full propulsion system,,,,,,there wasn't anything that was visible that could possibly have been holding these 7 white lights that blink and slow to a stop a heavy craft,,but there wasn't anything that i could see that would be supporting them,, i had a unobstructed view of this thing that was very well lit-up and it showed on structures on it, it was perfectly round and lit-up with nothing in the light source[as a back lighting, to show any exterior structures,, these 7 lights came on from nothing[ maybe most of this craft is invisible to us,, who content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: My fiance' and her daughter in managua, nicaragua has sent to me fotos of lights in the sky cloudy and clear, appear as orbs random but some remaing in a triangular pattern. i have more fotos and this is an ongoing event that is unexplainable to her and becoming frightening
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: They are unexplainable and confusing, i have been to her house on stays but never witnessed anything like this
